lines.text: We must cross rivers, we must climb mountains. Must we listen to this, too?

[Fritz enters quicksand]
My gramophone; save my gramophone.
Turks are afraid of fire?... Germans too.

[Indicating the twin mountain peaks]
if we'd crashed between them, we'd be at the mine!
Fine! Next time we steal a plane, i'll let you crash it!
Zurueck! Ihr verdammten schwarzen Idioten! Back! You black f**king idiots!
With their great understanding of German that should certainly bring them back!
